edu.caltech.sbw
Interface BrokerInterface

public interface BrokerInterface

This class defines an internal, programmatic interface to methods defined by the Broker. It is used internally for implementing the SBW client library and is not intended to be used by client applications.

Version:
$Revision: 1.2 $
Author:
Michael Hucka, $Author: mhucka $
